Class BallotFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • BallotFile

  • public class BallotFile
extends java.lang.Object

    BallotFile

    Purpose

    The BallotFile class provides utility methods to automatically read a specific File ballot_file and to obtain information from each line of it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BallotFile(java.io.File ballot_file)
      Initializes a BallotFile instance by reading each line of the specified ballot_file

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getElectionType()
      Provides a method to obtain the election type of the specified ballot_file passed into the constructor.
      java.lang.String getFilename()
      Accessor method for the filename of the ballot_file passed into the constructor
      java.lang.String getLine(int line_num)
      Provides a method to obtain a specific line from the specified ballot_file passed into the constructor.
      int getNumLines()
      Provides a method to obtain the number of lines within the specified ballot_file passed into the constructor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BallotFile

        public BallotFile(java.io.File ballot_file)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes a BallotFile instance by reading each line of the specified ballot_file
        Parameters:
        ballot_file - A File object specifying the ballot file to be used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an IOException if opening or reading the specified ballot_file fails.

    • Method Detail

      • getFilename

        public java.lang.String getFilename()
        Accessor method for the filename of the ballot_file passed into the constructor
        Returns:
        a String denoting the filename of the specified ballot_file.

      • getLine

        public java.lang.String getLine(int line_num)
        Provides a method to obtain a specific line from the specified ballot_file passed into the constructor.
        Parameters:
        line_num - The line number for which the contents of the ballot_file is to be returned.
        Returns:
        a String denoting the contents of the specified ballot_file at line line_num.

      • getNumLines

        public int getNumLines()
        Provides a method to obtain the number of lines within the specified ballot_file passed into the constructor.
        Returns:
        a int denoting the number of lines contained within ballot_file.

      • getElectionType

        public java.lang.String getElectionType()
        Provides a method to obtain the election type of the specified ballot_file passed into the constructor.
        Returns:
        a String denoting the election type of ballot_file, e.g. "IR" or "OPL".
